pr_title: HIVE-23813 : Fix flaky tests due to JDO Exception

timeline.message: HIVE-23813 : Fix flaky tests due to JDO Exception

timeline.bodyText: I think this class should depend on a different config knob
timeline.author: kgyrtkirk

replies.bodyText: please correct the comment in initialDelay method as well
replies.author: kgyrtkirk

replies.bodyText:
Metrics are always enabled by default. So didn't want to introduce a new config.
The metric collection depends if the scheduled queries are enabled. If not, there is no metric collection for replication as the primary key for the table is schedule id.
replies.author: aasha

timeline.author: kgyrtkirk

timeline.bodyText:
is this method supposed to be fast? (because ArrayList was created for a specified size)
...anyway try not to throw away ObjectMapper instances right after use - ObjectMapper's first time use cost could be high
timeline.author: kgyrtkirk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -121,6 +121,7 @@ public void run() {
             ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
